message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. My initial offer is $15,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $15,000 price point. I would like to propose an offer of $10,000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be at $13,000 to make it worth my while. I'm willing to negotiate further, but I need to see some movement from your end.
Thank you for considering my situation, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $12,000 for the product.
